HOME.TITLE: Turn Waste into Rewards
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Recycle your materials and earn points redeemable for amazing rewards
HOME.STEP_1_DESC: Browse our extensive catalog of materials to find what matches your waste stream.
HOME.STEP_2_DESC: Our platform connects you directly with verified buyers in your area.
HOME.STEP_3_DESC: Redeem your points for exclusive rewards or donate them to environmental causes.
HOME.FEATURED_REWARDS_DESC: Earn points for your sustainable actions and redeem them for these exclusive rewards. Every contribution helps build a greener future.
HOME.REWARD_1_DESC: Redeem your points for popular gift cards from major retailers. Perfect for treating yourself while supporting sustainability.
HOME.REWARD_2_DESC: Premium eco-friendly tote bag made from recycled materials. Durable, stylish, and perfect for your sustainable lifestyle.
HOME.REWARD_3_DESC: Beautiful air-purifying houseplant in a sustainable pot. Bring nature indoors and improve your living space.
HOME.TESTIMONIALS_DESC: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our community members say about their experience.
HOME.TESTIMONIAL_1: EcoPoints made recycling fun and rewarding. I've earned over 2000 points in just 3 months!
HOME.TESTIMONIAL_2: The easiest way to contribute to the environment while getting something back. Highly recommend!
HOME.TESTIMONIALS_BTN_DESC: Join our growing community of sustainable businesses and individuals

ABOUT.TITLE: About EcoPoints
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Our mission to make recycling rewarding
ABOUT.HISTORY_CONTENT: Founded in 2023, EcoPoints began as a small initiative to encourage recycling in our community and has grown into a nationwide movement.
ABOUT.MISSION_CONTENT: We believe recycling should be rewarding. Our platform connects environmentally conscious individuals with businesses that value sustainability.
ABOUT.TEAM_CONTENT: We're a diverse group of environmentalists, technologists, and business professionals united by our passion for sustainability.
ABOUT.SUSTAINABILITY_DESC: We measure our success by our positive impact on the planet. Every transaction on our platform is designed to maximize resource recovery and minimize environmental harm.
ABOUT.INNOVATION_DESC: Our technology platform makes recycling easier and more rewarding than ever. We're constantly developing new tools to streamline material recovery.
ABOUT.COMMUNITY_DESC: We believe real change happens when people work together. Our community of recyclers, businesses, and environmentalists drives everything we do.
ABOUT.TEAM_INTRO: Our diverse team of environmentalists, technologists, and business experts share a common passion for creating sustainable solutions. Together, we're building the future of recycling.
ABOUT.TEAM_MEMBER_1: With 15 years in environmental management, Sarah founded EcoCycle to bridge the gap between waste producers and recycling solutions
ABOUT.TEAM_MEMBER_2: Michael leads our technology team, developing the platforms that power our circular economy with expertise in sustainable tech solutions.
ABOUT.TEAM_MEMBER_3: An environmental scientist by training, Elena ensures all our operations meet the highest standards of ecological responsibility.
